name: Fight For Love (itch) (Mr_folyo)
description:
[Story]
Cows are kidnapping our lover and we take the gun from the house and go after our lover.  A horse appears before us, we kill it and go to the challenging track.
When we were finally going to fight the cows and save our lover...(spoiler)

[weapon]=Weapon
[character]=Retired soldier
[Enemies]=Cow,Horse
[Producer]=Mr.folyo
